itemincludestranscend32gbsecuredigitalsd: Transcend 32GB SecureDigital (SDHC) 300x UHS-1 Class 10 Memory Card Shoot and store more pictures at blazing-fast Class 10 speed! More memory means more pictures, and you'll be able to store hundreds of high-quality photos and videos with this ultra-fast Transcend 32GB SecureDigital (SDHC) 300x UHS-1 Class 10 Memory Card . SDHC features high data transfer speeds, allowing you to capture images and video faster than with a standard SD card. Now you can shoot faster, capture super-smooth digital video, and take full advantage of your camera's maximum image quality and resolution settings . UHS-1 Cards are fully compatible with SD 3.01 standards , easy to use with plug-and-play operation and feature built-in Error Correcting Code (ECC) to detect and correct transfer errors. Approximate Storage Capacity (32GB): 6,552 photos (10MP JPG) 480 minutes of video (9Mbps) 8,000 songs (4MB MP3)

itemincludesprecisiondesignuniversallcds: Precision Design Universal LCD Screen Protectors Keep your LCD screen clean and protected from scratches. This package contains 3 Universal LCD Screen Protectors that can be easily cut to size, attached and removed. Each piece protects your LCD screen from scratches and wear, and reduces glare for enhanced viewing. A squeegee card is also included to make application even easier, and to reduce air bubbles. These screen protectors can be used on a variety of electronic devices including digital cameras, camcorders, cell phones, handheld video games, and more. Key Features: Prevents scratches and wear Reduces glare Helps to maintain LCD and product warranty Can be trimmed to fit any size LCD screen (up to 5 inches diagonally)

itemincludes1yearsubscriptiontooutdoorph: 1-Year Subscription to Outdoor Photography Magazine Your #1 Guide for Better Outdoor Photography is the premier magazine about outdoor photography. A one-year subscription is included as part of your purchase... that's Outdoor Photographer 11 issues packed with valuable tips, tricks and news about nature photography, conveniently delivered to your door! A prepaid Subscription Voucher Card will be included with your order, which will activate your subscription when mailed to Outdoor Photography. The first of your eleven issues will then be sent to your address (USA and Canadian addresses only) in about 10 weeks. One subscription per household. Outdoor Photography's technique articles are geared to helping you capture the best wildlife, travel and outdoor sports photography. Review photography tips and keep up with digital photography as applied to nature photography, and stay current with the latest in photography equipment. You can also explore readers' favorite places that offer the best in photography locations.

itemincludesprecisiondesign25xtelephoto4: 2.5x Telephoto & .45x Wide-Angle Digital Lenses Extend your Telephoto, Wide Angle & Macro capabilities These handy lenses have been designed to enhance your wide angle, telephoto and macro capabilities, while maintaining the full autofocus and auto exposure operations of your camera. Construction from durable , lightweight aluminum , these attachments easily fit to the front of most small-diameter lenses with a filter thread, and are themselves threaded to accept filters for further creative effects and picture control. The all-glass lens elements are fully coated to reduce reflections and flare, and will match the optical quality of today's high-performance digital cameras and camcorders. Each lens is supplied with front and rear lens caps, and soft case for protection. These lenses will fit the following filter mounts: 49mm, 52mm, 55mm, 58mm These add-on lenses work best with standard focal length lenses, such as NOTE: 18-55mm lenses included with most DSLR cameras. 2.5x Telephoto Lens: When your camera can't get you close enough to capture the action in detail, this 2.5x Telephoto lens will bring the action to you! Optically multiplying the focal length of your camera's lens by a factor of 2.5, it more than doubles your telephoto magnification and detail without any pixelization. This is dramatically better than the "Digital Zoom" feature of many cameras where the magnification is obtained by merely enlarging the existing image, resulting in a loss of sharpness. This 2.5x telephoto attachment is perfect for all your long-distance imaging including sports, candids, surveillance, nature and wildlife. You will also be able to utilize your camera's macro capability at over twice the usual distance , allowing for easier subject lighting with less shadows and intrusion. Normal View 2.5x Telephoto View 0.45x Wide Angle Lens: When you've run out of room, and can't possibly fit anything else into the frame, this 0.45x Wide Angle adapter will allow you to capture it all! This attachment more than doubles your camera's wide angle field-of-view . Scenic shots will be more panoramic and you'll be able to take outstanding group photos, even in tight places. In addition, the detachable Macro Lens enables you to photograph small objects up close. Great for jewelry, coins, stamps, flowers, and more. Even if your camera already has macro capability, this macro lens will get you even closer for truly amazing close-up photos. Normal View 0.45x Wide Angle View

itemincludesprecisiondesign6piececameral: Precision Design 6-Piece Lens & Digital SLR Cleaning Kit Essential items for the proper maintenance of your equipment. It's obvious that the cleaner the lens and camera sensor, the sharper your pictures will be. Dirt, dust, and fingerprints will degrade the image quality of even the finest optics. However, it's equally important to avoid using incorrect cleaning materials which can permanently damage your photo equipment. This 6-piece cleaning kit contains everything you'll ever need to properly clean your lenses and digital SLR camera , including an air blower, soft brush, cleaning solution, lens tissues, cotton swabs, and a microfiber cloth. Also includes a soft carrying pouch.

With the use of a tripod, you can freely shoot at slow shutter speeds and extreme telephoto settings, and you can compose shots with precise control for perfect portraits and group pictures.
